author: COMSOL
description: This tutorial model shows how to set up a model of a pulsed capacitive discharge. The on pulse consists of 10 periods of excitation at 13.56 MHz, followed by no excitation for 100 periods. The I-V characteristics, the electron density, temperature and plasma potential are studied.
label: pulsed_ccp_discharge.mph
name: root
